options.command: NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 pnpm exec webpack-cli --config apps/reactRemoteUI/webpack.config.prod.js --mode production

development.command: NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 pnpm exec webpack-cli --config apps/reactRemoteUI/webpack.config.js --mode development

production.command: NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 pnpm exec webpack-cli --config apps/reactRemoteUI/webpack.config.prod.js --mode production

options.command: NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 pnpm exec webpack-cli serve --config apps/reactRemoteUI/webpack.config.js --mode development --port 4201

development.command: NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 pnpm exec webpack-cli serve --config apps/reactRemoteUI/webpack.config.js --mode development --port 4201

production.command: NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 pnpm exec webpack-cli serve --config apps/reactRemoteUI/webpack.config.prod.js --mode production --port 4201 --no-hot
